text: @JennieTetreault @readingtheend I sent my divorce lawyer a dozen roses and her assistant a half dozen roses after my divorce was finalized. The assistant convinced me to hire her boss, and her boss was the reason I could sleep at night during the divorce. ❤️
@readingtheend I'm already a divorce attorney. How much more evil am I supposed to get?
what's your evil job? like if you were Evil You, what unethical job would you excel at?
